ClientConnection - Interface in it.polimi.se2018.networking.server
The ClientConnection receives VCAbstractMessages from the network, and notifies them to the RemoteView The remote view sends MVAbstractMessages through the network using the send() method of the ClientConnection.
ClientConnectionAdapter - Class in it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.rmi
Class that adapts an RMIClientConnection to a ClientConnection: the methods in RMIClientConnection need to throw a RemoteException, so RMIClientConnection cannot directly extend the ClientConnection interface, an adapter is needed.
